title: No Gentleman
description: 'The dreamlike time in the past had long since been pushed from her mind as the fantasy it was; what she was faced with now seemed like a nightmare from which she could never awaken.'Anna thought he might have loved her once but that was a long time ago, and the Ryan Cassidy she knew now bore no resemblance to the man she had once known.Yet there he was - back in her life, a bully and a cheat, and what was more, Anna knew, she was about to make the same mistake of giving in to him all over again!
author: Kate Walker
